name: Melvin LINDSEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Lindsey v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Melvin LINDSEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of September, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
957 A.2d 230
Melvin LINDSEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 87 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 24, 2008.
